程序包 me.tongfei.progressbar.wrapped

类 ProgressBarWrappedWriter

java.lang.Object
java.io.Writer
java.io.FilterWriter
me.tongfei.progressbar.wrapped.ProgressBarWrappedWriter
所有已实现的接口:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
public class ProgressBarWrappedWriter extends FilterWriter
A writer whose progress is tracked by a progress bar.
从以下版本开始:
0.9.3
作者:
Tongfei Chen
